name: Server Simulator
description:
Keep your website alive no matter how many requests come in.
Upgrade your infrastructure to handle increasing demand from Rising repution.
Occaisonal DDOS Attacks towards your Servers will also provide an intresting Challenge.

Unfortunately we had no time and the game still requires balancing.

I made this game with Larsogames.

If you want to contribute or take a look at our code go to
https://github.com/codinghusi/server-simulator

We'd love if you'd send us feedback :)
